content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my 3rd floor balcony at 10pm smoking my cigar facing ssw around 81st in miami beach, fl, i noticed a fast moving orb like object with alternating green and red lights.  the object would hover, then move smoothly and quickly across the sky, travel east then west, north then south and descend on top of or behind a building located about 300 meters away across a small canal.  the object made a slight humming sound when it flew closer.  i am leaning towards some kind of advanced private or government drone.  i have seen helicopters and planes in the area, this was nothing like the other aircraft.  the event was weird enough to prompt me to post something here for the first time.  the object finally disappeared behind or on top of a building and did not return.  my only emotion was curiosity.  video is available.
content.summary: Disk/sphere object glowing red/green, rapid flight and hovering.

content.detailedDescription: On the way back from picking my girlfriend up from work driving down the coast road heading home and to are right of in the distance we both saw a green light about 2-3 mile out at sea drop down from above the clouds it was over and not appear out the bottom of the clouds. its decent lasted about 3 seconds i have drove that route 100 of times and never witnessed anything like that it was completely silent and seemed like it was a controlled decent.
content.summary: Bright silent green light about 2-3 mile out to sea dropped down into the cloud below it and did not come out the bottom of the cloud.

content.detailedDescription: My friend posted this picture this morning and i immediately noticed the blue light in the sky. no one else noticed it, or made a comment, but i found it very strange.
content.summary: I was not witness, my friend posted this picture and the first thing i noticed was the orb

content.detailedDescription: I was watching t.V and it was the night of which there was supposed to be a huge aurora borealis show over even the northern most of the us.  so at 12:00am wednesday, march 18 2015 (00:00 military time) i turned off the t.V. and tried to look out various windows in hopes of seeing some of the aurora borealis.  instead, out of the second story window, almost directly above the house tops across the street (i live in a house complex) i saw a pink-ish, yellow-ish, white-ish glowing disc shaped object.  it looked like your classic ufo but i quickly thought to myself, it can't be a ufo it's got to be a plane there's just no way.  but i kept staring at it trying to figure out what it looked like and everything, to kind of try and prove to myself that it was just a plane.  but it didnt make sense that there was no noise, it was bigger than a traditional plane, lower than a plane should be, and definitely didn't look like any plane or other flying vehicle i've ever seen before.  i then hurried to grab my phone and try to take a  video of it, but oddly enough it did not show up on the video, instead exactly where the ufo i saw with my naked eye, was a blurry weird kind of reflective like thing showing up on the video.  i then just stared at it with my naked eye and kept recording to the best of my ability without looking at the phone, because i wanted to observe the ufo to the best of my ability and couldn't view it through the video.  the ufo looked as if it was glowing, and very slowly pulsated between glowing a very light pink to a light yellow to a white, it would change colors visibly about every 5-15 seconds.  it seemed as if it was staying at the same altitude, but it was moving kind of in an elliptical line around my house (from the view i had of it for the quick minute or 2 i had sight of it) not really a straight line, it seemed very close in distance (around a mile away or so would be my guess) and very low in altitude  (right above the tree/house line) it went from the right side of my view to the left (sorry, i don't know my directions and do not currently have a compass to provide you with which geographical direction it was moving in) and was consistent in size as it moved across (which is why i say it moved in an elliptical motion rather than a straight line).  to the left of my house is a small hill, in which the ufo eventually flew behind the tree line of the hill as it moved to the left side of my view/house and i lost sight of it.  the entire duration of which i was able to view the ufo was about 12:03am to 12:05am (00:03-00:05).
content.summary: Looked out window for slim chance to see aurora borealis, saw instead a ufo gliding pretty low and slow

content.detailedDescription: A flying object with a shape of the letter 'm' was flying in manchester from the north to the south. it was rotating with a speed of 1 rotation per second approximately. it toke around 2 minutes to cross the sky. i have pictures taken by my canon dslr with a zoom lens at 200 mm focal length. it wasn't a plane as i track nearby flights using flightradar24.Com.
content.summary: Has a shape of the letter 'm'

content.detailedDescription:
I am sorry but i don't have date and year of actual sighting may 1996 is a ballpark guess.  

after a long day of shooting prairie dogs about 10-20 miles west of mobridge sd my best friend and our two sons were heading back to town for the night.  it was roughly around 10pm and it was very dark out. we were the only ones on the road.  a very bright light appears in the rearview mirror of my car that i am driving.  i started to rant and rave about how this ass has his high beams on and is flying up on us like crazy.  it was approaching so fast that i feared we were gong to be rear ended.  dropping my speed from around 70mph to around 30 and almost in the ditch to make room for the ass going so fast, it became apparent it wasn't a car. it was above the road.  it was so bright it lit up the area around it for 300yrds? it flew over the car lighting the inside like daytime.  we could not tell how high it was for the brightness was to great.  a guess would be 500ft but that's a guess because we cant really tell the size of it bigger than the car.  i thought right away of a military helicopter and the jerks inside laughing there asses off.  we both watched as it went by for some sight of being a machine.  we both had spent time in the army so have seen them and know how we would have done something like that to screw around. there was no sound no wave of air no effect on the car.  it was just big bright light like a meteor. like the recent youtube shots in russia. so we hope to see it bounce but never did just went over the horizon into nowhere?
content.summary: Passed by ufo on hwy 12 near mobridge sd

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were driving in the car the afternoon of 3/28/2015, and suddenly a brilliantly chromed round object in the sky caught our eye at the exact same time. the sky was light blue without any clouds, so there wasnt anything else in the sky but this round chrome object. the object just hung there in the sky.  we asked each other if the other one had just saw that. and we both confirmed to each other that yes we had. we had never seen anything like that before. we then parked the car and looked out the window to see if we could continue to observe it, and the object just disappeared without a trace in front of our eyes. we were shaken up, and in disbelief of what we had just saw, but we continued on our way. then about 5-8 minutes later we saw 3 f-16 jets flying in formation over the area, then we saw another f-16 come to join them to the left of us and then yet another to the right coming joining them as well.
content.summary: Chrome object suddenlyappeared then disappeared in clear sky

content.detailedDescription: I'm sure you hear a lot of wild stories, but mine is ongoing, and has been for several years.  i have both security footage, and pictures of several types of "aliens", although i'm hesitant to call them aliens, since i have witnessed them control everything from birds, animals, trees, the weather, and any light, anywhere, at anytime. these videos and pictures go back to around 2011. although i have seen numerous ufo's, this is not really about them, this is more about the beings that use them. if this were just about the aliens, i would not be notifying you.  as i said earlier, this is an ongoing presence in my life. they are not visiting here, they live here! since i am not in a ufo hotspot, this makes no sense. you can speak with anyone who knows me, and they will tell you about some of the antics that i have witnessed. i can show you lights you can't explain, stars that will move on command, and some of the strangest things you have ever witnessed. mythical beings are common here, strange as that may sound. i have not reported this earlier, because i didn't want my life disrupted, but the things that they have made me aware of now, i know i have to share, because, even though i took the pictures, i'm having trouble believing what i am seeing. this coming from someone who has been aware of an alien presence for almost 10 years.  i have over 100 acres that is strategically perfect.  i am able to see almost 100 miles from my location, but unless you are on my land you cannot see on my land, since it is all higher than the road. i could fill this page and several others with things that i have witnessed, and been apart of over the last several years. since i am going to have to share these experiences, i am now planning on writing a book to share, not only what i have recently been made aware of, but some of the most interesting things that have happened, over the last few years. i would certainly like to talk to someone about this, and you can see some things that will make you scratch your head, and say damn, that's unreal! i will be glad to share the evidence i have, but not for all to see.
content.summary: I have witnessed alien activity here for several years.  shortly before the first of the year they made me aware of something i had to share.

content.detailedDescription: I sited a ufo in the mid-1960s, perhaps 1966 or 1967.  i may have been about 6 or 7 years old.  it landed on our property located in long island.  it was perhaps 8 feet in diameter, color red, solid, and perhaps glowing. to the best of my recollection, it was a domed shape.  it landed under a large tree.  i watched it for about 3 minutes (approximately, because it is difficult to specifically judge time, especially when one is young and not very conscious about time.  i observed it in daylight from our living room, which was off limits to us children.  yet, for some unknown reason, i decided to go into this room, which had a locked glass sliding door. i was dressed in my pajamas and robe.  as i said earlier, i watched it for several minutes.  i then tried to unlock the sliding glass door to go to it, but it wouldn't open no matter how i tried.  i then ran into the kitchen beside the living room, also with a similar view to our backyard.  it also had a sliding glass door with access to the place where i spotted the ufp.  this time, i was able to unlock the door, but when i got to the kitchen, the object was already gone.  i ran down to the tree to look for clues, but found none.  it is a memory that has stayed vivid, even after all of these years.
content.summary: Observed in daylight under a tree. red/orange, dome shaped, approximately 8 ft. in diameter. suddenly disappears.

content.detailedDescription: At my moms house.I notice a bright fireball object.A ufo.Fireball object red and orange with no noise fire appeared to be burning.Got my dad out to see got my phone and recorded the event.The object went out over the power plant.Just last year i seen ufo in clewiston while i was fishing drop down from clouds and shoot back in there was an airplane flying above it going another way.
content.summary: 2 round fireball objects traveling same path east.The first pass me until it flashed out over the power plant.There was another coming from the same direction first one came from took about 3mins tell it also pass the power plant and vanished.Nosound

content.detailedDescription: I was on northpointe blvd, going west towards shaw rd. i observed a fairly large for the elevation, object with large bulbus (bulky) very bright red and white lights, nothing like a plane as there were planes in the area at normal altitude. this object appeared to be the size of a large pick-up or maybe two side by side. i can't say the color exactly, but it seemed shiny like chrome or something... it appeared to be roughly 2000' above the neighborhood lake and stopped and hovered when i stopped to look at it. it was 5:20ish in the morning. it hovered for a few seconds, then traversed eastward rapidly for maybe what appeared to be 500' stopped, hovered for a few more seconds and then continued its path southeast towards hwy 249 at spring cypress. the strange lights are what first caught my attention and caused me to stop on the side of road. a vehicle behind me also stopped, but we did not get out and talk to one another. once it continued on its path, i headed on to work. i didn't know what it was, but it was strange and it was not an airplane or helicopter. i had my window rolled down and heard no sound other than my vehicle. i lost sight of the object when it passed the tree line.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fairly large object strange lights and movement

content.detailedDescription: This is just a test - please delete.
content.summary: Test

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping on my new property out in the woods, no electricity, no water, etc its completely off grid and extremely remote.
i'd say around 2:10 am i heard what i thought was a bear eating a bag of chips, i grabbed my pistol and exited tent and realized i had a dead flashlight, then something caught my attention, as i was turning to look i felt static electricity so bad my skin started to itch like crazy and i felt naked like my clothing was light as air or completely being repelled by static. i seriously stsrted to feel drugged because nothing was making sny damn sense, i even considered i got bitten by a spider, scorpion and was hallucinating. i started calming down and realized that there is something big in the sky coming in my direction, i became terrified as i realize its dead quite and has this static sound, but not just static, it sounded like serious high voltage static. the "craft" was black like negative energy, a black hole kind of dark. it came at my direction in a curved path from the ne mostly from north then slowed down with a faint glow it looked dark purple and i could see a greenish blue area from time to time. i had to remember to breathe and shske my head because i was in total confusion of what i was seeing. it came within a mile or so and stopped above the tree line it seemed to hover and cicle around an area for about five minutes or more or it seemed. it glowed a little bright then it launched, dropped things into the woods, they completely reminded me of the time i held burning plastic and the melting drops that were on fire as they fell. my mouthed dropped as the fuzzy glowing orbs starting falling from the main ship. no idea what they were but i got scared as never before , i thought what if it launched ground troops and they are heading my way. sudden terror hit me i was wondering how fast i could get my van and me out of there. and more dropping balls fell this time i could see perfectly and they were slightly different sizes, i had this thought that just maybe its going to crash and having serious troubles. at mid thought it went completely black and started to crackle witn static then took off with a deep rumbly vibration that seemed to encapsulate everything into s dreamy surreal feeling, it was gone and i couldn't comprehend what happened, still cant believe it
the next day i was tempted to see where it hovered but no thanks. 
has anyone else seen this kind of craft? it was flat near as i could see, it was rectangular but witb a curved nose.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sn object came into view, hovered, expelled "things", flew low omni-directional, left.

content.detailedDescription: Had to sit outside to smoke, watching stars, object came from south flew north until out of site. sky clear 34 degrees, went inside after about a minute and locked doors.Have seen objects before, never this close, could have been a drone, not sure???
content.summary: Flew over house

content.detailedDescription:
It was two level massive in size all chrome windows on both levels look liked 
a building it was square made no noise was hovering over the trees the trees was not disturb after a few seconds it left south rapidly in about a 60 degree upwards level. it went from massive to small as it left til a bright white dot then nothing, in other word its like you are looking at some thing at full zoom level then you go to the smallest then it is gone, it vanishes the last thing i saw was a flash of bright white light and it just vanished, i know this sounds crazy but it is true
content.summary: I went out my back door to feed my chickens and i notice about the tree line a huge two level square chrome object hovering over the trees it was massive almost looked like a building made no noise...

content.detailedDescription: At 9:45 pm pst, an object was observed travelling from the se at high rate of speed and observed by two people who were "sober" and not impaired in anyway.  object appeared to be bluish white with energy field that appeared to be a halo but did not have any trail of light or debris.  object was observed from sea level on a clear night however, the object appeared to be travelling through clouds.  again, the optical effect of the halo around the object (orb) distorted any details of shape or marking of the object.  unable to determine rate of speed of the object and altitude however, the object appeared 25 degrees of horizon travelling a very rapid rate of speed with an approximate observation time of 15 seconds and object making immediate change in direction at 45 - 90 degrees to the east and was no longer observable (disappeared from sight).  object did not emit any sound what so ever considering object's rate of speed and assumed low altitude.  this object did not flash or have any aviation lights of different colors, same colors.  the object was unidentifiable with any aircraft observed to date.  object was not a shooting star or falling star, meteorite or any other object falling to earth.
content.summary: Glowing orb with energy field moving incredibly fast no sound and sudden change of direction then dissapears

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were strolling the boardwalks along morro bay at a slow relaxed pace.  it was mid-late afternoon but the sun was still brightly shining.  when i turned away from the bay and looked up, i noticed the moon in the sky although it was still pretty sunny.  i pointed this out to my husband saying "wow, you can see the moon already, i guess its getting late" but since daylight savings time went into effect a couple of weeks ago, it's been hard to calculate the time recently.  it was then that my husband questioningly asked "is that..Are those...Birds?" but then he immediately said "oh my gosh, look!  do u see that?"  he paused a few seconds and then said "that's not a bird or an airplane, oh my gosh, look!"  it was then that i too saw the two objects moving across the sky like the speed of an airplane but the two objects seemed much closer to us than an airplane.  there were two extremely bright, metallic orbs in the sky and they moved in tandem, at a steady pace, as if connected possibly because they were so in sync with each other.  as they moved across the sky away from us, they seemed farther away then when we first saw them.   when we first noticed them, they seemed so close to us because of how well we could see them and their detail.  we were stunned and our sight fixed on the objects quite in disbelief.  then they suddenly disappeared.  my husband didn't see them again, but i thought i saw them for a moment again, and then they vanished like turning off a light switch.  they didn't fade away or zoom off out of our sight, they just popped off.  that's the best way to describe it.  we were bewildered after this happened and immediately looked around to see if anyone else was seeing what we saw, but folks aren't looking up at the sky in the opposite direction of morro bay or the rock.  most folks were either in restaurants, on the water in canoes/boats or on the boardwalk observing nature, not the sky.  i looked around a lot to find someone else also looking up as i desperately wanted someone else to say "did you see that?" as we were both feeling uneasy and in need for some affirmation outside of ourselves.  it may seem wierd, but we just kept walking along and continued to enjoy the afternoon, not really talking about it as i think we were both in disbelief, but as the night came we talked about it a little more wishing we had a camera or binoculars to affirm what we saw.  we decided to make this report in hopes that someone else saw this also in morro bay today or in the surrounding area.  thanks for hearing our story.  [names removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Two metallic orbs moving in tandem across sky then disappeared suddenly

content.detailedDescription: I was stationed in bremerton, wa. i lived in the bayview west apartments on kitsap way. i walked into my living room and saw 1 brilliant white light that was pulsating. every now and then a red triangle appeared below it. i walked out on my balcony to look. as i watched a second appeared. it started out as a dull light as if distant. it instantly grew to the size of the other. then another and another. as i watched i could see commercial air lines going to and from seatac. i noticed another bright light to the south coming from the general direction of olympia. it just moved right in beside the others. as it did so a commercial flight (obviously an airplane) was traveling in the same direction. the questionable object moved so much faster than the plane that the plane seemed to not have moved. then a few in the column vanished until only one was left. the last object was also the first object it stayed in the same place for approximately 45 minutes. this was the night of 15 nov2015 at approximately 2200. the night of the 16th or the following night at the same time the same thing happened exactly as before which is when i recorded what i did on my phone.
content.summary: Two nights in a row clustered. coming and going

content.detailedDescription: I walked onto the porch and sat down. it was about 12:25 am. about 5 minutes later i looked up and saw a black triangle shaped object with 3 white lights in the corner and a red light in the center that was hovering. at first i thought it was a helicopter but it started to gain altitude and then it hovered. it then disappeared for about 5 seconds and then it appeared again about 200 feet lower than before. then the lights blinked about 10 times and just disappeared. it had no sound at all.
content.summary: The ufo was hovering and the lights blinked.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a doctoral course at baylor university that met twice a week from 7 to 8:30 pm.  after class as i was heading west, i observed a light above lake waco.  at first, i thought it was the planet venus; but as i kept heading west, the light was more and more to my right.  so, i know it wasn't a planet or a star.  since we were not far from fort hood, i assumed it must have a low helicopter.  

two nights later, i observed the same light as i was coming home, so i thought i would investigate.  i crossed over the bridge and took the first exit into speegleville park that is on the west side of lake waco.  as i approached the light, the craft began to move slowly west then crossed over the highway.  i followed it and took the next exit that crossed over the highway.  

i saw the craft go down behind a clump of trees.  i drove past the area about 100 yards, looking in my rear view mirror.  i moved off on the shoulder, facing southeast, turned off my lights but left my engine running.  

after a few minutes, i observed the craft slowing rising from the tree area and moved toward my direction.  it came to rest just to the right of my vehicle, about 35 feet in the air just on the other side of a fence and a power line which was about 20 feet above the ground.  the craft made absolutely no sound but was able to remain motionless.  

i could see the cockpit and observed 3 small heads peering down at me.  there was a green hue in the cockpit.  after about 5 minutes, the craft shined a green light toward my car, causing the engine to die.  i tried starting it to no avail.  also, my lights nor radio would work.  it was then that i got nervous and locked my doors.  

finally, after trying to get my engine to start every 2-3 minutes, it finally started after about 20 minutes.  i drove my car down the road about 150 yards where i turned on my lights and did a u-turn.  

when i passed the craft which was now on my left, it made no attempt to follow me.  as i got back on the highway to go home, i could see that it was still there.  

(my background includes 2 years of air force rotc, 2 years active duty in the u.S. army with a top secret clearance, and six years in the texas state guard as a commissioned officer.)
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black triangular obect about 20 ft. wide and 30 ft. long.  it was able to hang motionless about 35 ft. above the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a child, around 10 or so. my brother, 7 years my senior, and my sister, 3 years younger than me, were all inside the house playing monopoly. my mother was out on the back porch which faced the army depot at the corner of remount and virginia avenue in north charleston, s.C. suddenly we heard mom calling us all to come outside and "look at the ufo". she sounded very alarmed and excited and we all went out to see the object. she pointed toward the army depot and just above the area we observed a cigar shaped object, seemingly hovering. while we watched it, it turned colors. when we first went out it was bright red. then it turned a violet color, then blue, and then a yellow-pale orange color, and finally it turned white, bright white, and took off toward the north east. mom said she first noticed it because she thought it was a shooting star, so she saw it actually approach the base where it stopped and hovered. that's when she called for all of us to come out and see it.
naturally we were scared, and excited. 
we lost sight of it when it changed to the bright white, and shot off toward the ne extremely fast.

in 1995 my daughter and myself also witnessed a triangular object with 3 white lights on the underside slowly glide just above the treetops and over the house. she had beed driving home from work and saw it some distance away, heading the same direction she was coming. she ran in the house and told me to come outside and see this "thing" that was coming toward us. we stood on the porch and watched it come across the tops of the pine trees, approaching without a sound, and watched it black out the stars overhead for a full minute as it passed across... we went inside and went out the back door to follow it's movement there but it was already gone. it was black, and totally silent.
content.summary: My mother called all of us onto the back porch to witness a ufo hovering over the area of the us army depot on remount road. it hovered and changed colors and then took off after about 5 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was home and playing a game.
went to take the dog out and it was up in the sky near the tree-line but waaay above it. it's there almost every night.
the object is here frequently, jets chase them, dive at them, it's a ufo or an inter-dimensional. the object hovered in place and would move with incredible mind-numbing speeds going side to side up and down very very quickly almost like it was free from gravity. i was ecstatic during the event as i always am when they come close ( which is almost every-night.)
after the event  i was still excited about it.  i captured video of the events and it's quite amazing!
i didn't lose sight cause they're always here. and always outside.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It gives off really bright lights, the shape is kinda hard to make do the intense light.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette i live next to an airport so i am very confident at my eyes when i see aircraft which land there. it is a small flight school with only small aircraft. as i look to the northeast i see what appears to be a formation of 3 diamonds wich all appear to be connected it was traveling silently and slower than landing airplanes. as i look at the object the diamond split into 3 separate diamond objects. they have flashing lights of all color or hue. at this point the diamonds begin to change shapes each triangle,diamond,cigar shape each independent of each other. i have a spotlight in my back yard so i shine it at one of the objects which darted forward and backwards and left to right each darting to evade the light i was shining. as i watched the shapes seemed to rejoin into one large diamond and in a large flash of color and no sound shot directly into the sky with lightning speed the total of my encounter lasted 15 min roughly.
content.summary: 3 diamond shaped silent flashing lights with color and shape shifting responsive to light

content.detailedDescription: My roommate and i were standing on our second floor balcony when i noticed a light to the south flash slight and becoming fully visible. jokingly, i said to my roommate "hey, look a ufo" (we were watching independence day and stepped outside during a commercial to see if we could see any fireworks)as it began moving from directly south of us at a heading of about 020 about the same speed a low flying aircraft. after about 20 seconds another orb light appeared in the same spot and traveled the same flight path as the first object. when the third appeared in the same manner the first object appeared to gain altitude and disappear. when the second object reached the same point where the first object disappeared it did the same thing. we saw five objects total, equally spaced, moving at the same speeds, and all appearing and disappearing at the same points. these were not conventional aircraft (i work in the aviation field), they were not fireworks ( from our perspective the objects traveled several miles across the sky), not chinese lanterns as they were moving much too fast.
content.summary: 4-5 orbs flashing into view, travelling a straight path, then dissapear

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from hortonville wi, it was just after 12 midnight,i was on cth m drivng south,as i neared spring road,there is a high point, hill, at the top of the hill i could see a bright white light south on cth m, i thought wow one of the local farmers had gotten a new very bright yard light.When i dropped down the other side of the hill in a low land , swamp that is about 3/4 mile long then a small hill, rise in the road i saw the light directly ahead of me, i could see it was not in anybodys yard, it seemed like it was 1/2 mile away, it was very bright,it suddenly shot straght up, i had slowed down at this point i opened my drivers window braked and stuck my head out the window ,i couldn't see it from inside the truck. when i looked out up, the light was ahead slightly then it shot to the left , east, the next thing i remember was waking up in my truck,i was partially in the ditch, up agaist a mailbox, the truck was about 150 ft from where i stopped to look for the light, just before the intersection of cth m and school rd that i was going to turn on to go home. i lived on school rd 2 miles east.I was very excited, i got home woke my parents up and told them i think i saw a ufo, they were laughing telling me i was druck or on dope.The next day the neighbor called and asked if i was ok, he said last night, his yard dogs were barking for a long time when he finally got up he could see my truck at the end of his driveway, he asked if it was me? i told it must have been, he asked for help in fixing his mailbox, i did help fix it. i never talked about this with anyone, i did one day asked my mother if she remembered the night i woke her and dad up, saying i saw a ufo, she told me just through talking and laughing about many times we kids got in trouble, she said,, when you woke me up that night i was so mad at you,saying it was 2 am and i had to get up at 5 am to go in early. so from my curfew time of 12 that i was going to home on time or near time i was 2 hours late.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription: I recently was reviewing images i took while on a trip to craig colorado in 2013.  in one of the photos taken to the south of craig in an unpopulated area, an object that appears to be a rapidly moving object appears.  the object was not seen by me or heard by me when the photo was taken. it appears to be moving from the southeast toward the northwest in the sky. image submitted. the object appears in the image as a black smudge to the right of the trees in the center of the image. i don't think this was a bird because of the amount of motion (blur).  the camera is a canon eos 7d, shot at iso 100, f6.3, 1/100.  also the shape of the object would indicate it was relatively large (larger than a bird).
content.summary: Found black smudge in photo that appears to be a rapidly moving aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
I was approximately 12 or 13 years old that summer (1972-73), it was late in the evening and a friend, my younger brother and i saw a strange object close to our schoolyard which was son our street. as we approached it, it seemed to hover a little lower and closer to us, as if observing us and close to a tree. it was a disc, sort of dome shaped with lights all around the bottom going around it. strangely enough, after 40+ years i recall that i was not afraid. all of a sudden it swooped up and moved at such speed in what seemed like seconds it has disappeared from my sight. we lived close to jfk airport so we were used to seeing airplanes all the time. i am as sure now, as i was back then, that what i saw was not an airplane or some military type aircraft.

because of the stigma associated with these sightings we never even spoke about it amongst ourselves, let alone other people. i don't know if my brother remembers this incident, as he was really young and i lost touch with my friend after moving from the area. but i am sure of what i saw and would have loved to be hypnotized to recall the event more clearly. i would love to know if anybody else in that vicinity and that time frame saw anything.
content.summary: Disc, dome shaped silver colored object with lights around the diameter

content.detailedDescription: i was driving home from work as an assistant manager of a discount dollar store in guntersville al just outside of town i was caught in a traffic jam as i was looking out the window to my left there was cows grazing in a pasture about  20 or so then i noticed an object above the cows about 25 yards it made now sound it was kinda a silver color or looked just like someone had blowed a big bubble the size of a house i first thought it was a reflection from the lake to my right so i rolled down my window and it was still there it made no sound the wind was blowing lightly in my direction from the way of the object but it just seemed like a natural wind i noticed no ordor from the unit it was just like the creature on the movie predator it reflected the objects from behind the craft and the only way i could tell it was there is that it distorted the things around it as it moved i watched it for about 3 minets then it either shot up and out of sight or it slightly moved streight up and disintergrated i dont know which i had written this down and tried to report this to the military all branches even the news but got no responce from anybody  i have tried seeveral times since 1997 to report this to proper authorities but nobody ever responded.I was not on any drugs then didnt even smoke cigeretts i have since seen something simurally on utube under ufo steals a cow in hawaii in i believe 2011 its on utube when i saw that video i about fell out of my chair thats exactly the same craft i saw back in 1997 i told my wife and family when i got home and they have agreed that the same ship i saw is the same as the one on utube i am not sure of what it is i suspect its a ship that is cloaked like on star trek or its time travel one of the two this is not a joke or anything i really saw what i have told you
content.summary: Was bubble type craft looked like it was not there till it moved

content.detailedDescription:
We just left a cleaning job on a car dealership, and were 1/4 mile north on coors to hang a u-turn at the signal. it was dark but clear skies and my wife and i observed this flash immediately over ours heads and immediately disappear traveling away from us .. immediately in front and away from us .. as we were stopped and in a north facing direction.
     the funny thing was i didn't say anything because i was not sure my wife noticed it.. a couple seconds past and my wife asked me if i saw the light over our heads and disappear over the horizon ..
     well this relived me ..As i had and so acknowledged her question with a yes..We both agreed it had to be a ufo.. we both had not seen such an thing together happen.. ever..

      here is the kicker; two days later on the news on tv they reported the same type of thing with video on news camera.. two days later..Check the news files .. i'm sure you will find it.
content.summary: My wife/me observed a bright flash immediately over and away from us while sitting at a signal light; we both saw it.

content.detailedDescription: I was on cob speicher, tikrit iraq sitting outside. in an instant i observed a straight line of lights, evenly spaced, flashed 2 times at the same time. like they were christmas lights being switched on and off. they seemed to arc the curvature of the earth like a line of lights wrapped around a ball.
content.summary: Equally spaced crafts blink twice all at the same time
